title: Classmate no Tanaka-san wa Sugoku Kowai
original_name: クラスメイトの田中さんはすごく怖い
sinopse:
In Nakajima's school, there is a super scary person named Tanaka. There are even rumours that she has killed people simply by looking at them. Unluckily, Nakajima ends up being Tanaka's desk neighbour. Every time he looks at her, he is met with a glare. However, perhaps Tanaka isn't as scary as people make her seem to be...

[Written by Phloup]
